      Location Location.addNeighbour​(Direction d, Location l)
      Adds a neighbour to this Location in the specified direction.
      Location Location.getNeighbour​(Direction d)
      Finds and returns neighbouring location of this Location in the specified direction, or null if no such neighbour exists
      java.lang.Boolean Location.hasExit​(Direction d)
      Returns true if and only if there is a Location adjacent to this Location in the specified Direction d, false otherwise
